ViewObject.Name: BoqValidationLinesVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxboqValidationLinesEO.BILL_DESCRIPTION, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BILL_QUANTITY, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BOQ_LEVEL, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CANDY_NET_RATE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CREATED_BY, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CREATION_DATE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.ERROR_DETAILS, XxboqValidationLinesEO.FINAL_QUANTITY, XxboqValidationLinesEO.ITEM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxboqValidationLinesEO.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.PAGE_ITEM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.PRICE_CODE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.SELLING_AMOUNT, XxboqValidationLinesEO.SELLING_RATE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.TRADE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.UOM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID, XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID, (select case when XxboqValidationLinesEO.FINAL_QUANTITY =0 then 0 else sum(nvl(cost_code_quantity,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0))/XxboqValidationLinesEO.FINAL_QUANTITY end from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t where validation_line_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID and bill_page_item is not null and price_code is not null) AS VIEW_ATTR, ((select nvl(sum(nvl(NET_USE_UNIT_NUM,0)* nvl(FINAL_RATE_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_RESOURCE_T where VALIDATION_LINE_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID)) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where ITEM is not null and BOQ_LEVEL is null and VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqValidationLinesEO.NET_FINAL_AMOUNT, XxboqValidationLinesEO.MASTER_VALIDATION_LINE_ID, XxboqValidationLinesEO.ERROR_PERCENTAGE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BILL_QUANTITY_NUM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT_NUM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CANDY_NET_RATE_NUM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.FINAL_QUANTITY_NUM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.SELLING_RATE_NUM, (select nvl(sum(nvl(FINAL_RATE_NUM,0)* nvl(NET_USE_UNIT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_RESOURCE_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N')) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BOQ_DB_LEVEL, XxboqValidationLinesEO.LINE_TYPE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.APPROVED, XxboqValidationLinesEO.SUBMITTED, XxboqValidationLinesEO.ESTIMATED, (select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'BOQ_LINE_TYPE' and lookup_code = XxboqValidationLinesEO.LINE_TYPE) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select sum(nvl(cost_code_quantity,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t where validation_line_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqValidationLinesEO.LINE_SEQUENCE, xxboq_boq_candy_pkg.xxboq_validation_line_delete_fun(XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BOQ_LEVEL is null and bill_page_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N')) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BOQ_LINE_REMARKS, XxboqValidationLinesEO.VARIATION_CATEGORY, (select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'VARIATION_CATEGORY' and lookup_code = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VARIATION_CATEGORY) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'M') AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and approved='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqValidationLinesEO.ANTICIPATED_VALUE, XxboqValidationLinesEO.VARIATION_NUM_CLIENT, XxboqValidationLinesEO.VARIATION_NUM_INTERNAL, (select case when (XxboqValidationLinesEO.SUBMITTED = 'Y' or XxboqValidationLinesEO.ESTIMATED = 'Y') then sum(nvl(anticipated_value,0)) else 0 end from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t where validation_line_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and submitted='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and approved='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and submitted='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and estimated='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and estimated='Y') AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BILL_NUMBER, XxboqValidationLinesEO.BILL_PAGE_ITEM, XxboqValidationLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID, XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID, XxboqValidationLinesEO.TASK_ID, (select pj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pj.project_number from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select cl.LINE_NUMBER from okc_k_lines_vl cl where cl.LINE_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pt.task_number from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' AND pt.task_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.TASK_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pt.task_name from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' and pt.task_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.TASK_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_rate_NUM,0)*nvl(final_quantity_num,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BOQ_LEVEL is null and bill_page_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N')) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select sum(nvl(cc.cost_code_quantity,0)*nvl(cc.cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t cc,pjf_rbs_elements rbs where cc.rbs_element_id = rbs.rbs_element_id and rbs.RESOURCE_CLASS_CODE = 'EQUIPMENT' and cc.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR

ViewAttribute.Name: TransNetRate
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select case when XxboqValidationLinesEO.FINAL_QUANTITY =0 then 0 else sum(nvl(cost_code_quantity,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0))/XxboqValidationLinesEO.FINAL_QUANTITY end from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t where validation_line_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID and bill_page_item is not null and price_code is not null)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransNetFinalAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: ((select nvl(sum(nvl(NET_USE_UNIT_NUM,0)* nvl(FINAL_RATE_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_RESOURCE_T where VALIDATION_LINE_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCandyNetFinalAmntTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(CANDY_NET_FINAL_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where ITEM is not null and BOQ_LEVEL is null and VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransNetFinalAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(FINAL_RATE_NUM,0)* nvl(NET_USE_UNIT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_RESOURCE_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSellingAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransLineType
ViewAttribute.Expression: select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'BOQ_LINE_TYPE' and lookup_code = XxboqValidationLinesEO.LINE_TYPE

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCostBudgetTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(nvl(cost_code_quantity,0)*nvl(cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t where validation_line_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalRevenueAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BOQ_LEVEL is null and bill_page_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationCategory
ViewAttribute.Expression: select meaning from xxboq_lookups_t where lookup_type = 'VARIATION_CATEGORY' and lookup_code = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VARIATION_CATEGORY

ViewAttribute.Name: TransMainContractAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'M')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationApprovedContractAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and approved='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransAnticipatedValueLineTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select case when (XxboqValidationLinesEO.SUBMITTED = 'Y' or XxboqValidationLinesEO.ESTIMATED = 'Y') then sum(nvl(anticipated_value,0)) else 0 end from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t where validation_line_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_LINE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationSubmittedContractAmountTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and submitted='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransClaimsApprovedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and approved='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransClaimsSubmittedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and submitted='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransVariationEstimatedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'V' and estimated='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransClaimsEstimatedContractAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_AMOUNT_NUM,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BILL_PAGE_ITEM is not null and line_type = 'C' and estimated='Y')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProjectName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProjectNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pj.project_number from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractLineNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select cl.LINE_NUMBER from okc_k_lines_vl cl where cl.LINE_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.CONTRACT_LINE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaskNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pt.task_number from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' AND pt.task_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.TASK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaskName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pt.task_name from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.PROJECT_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.chargeable_flag = 'Y' and pt.task_id = XxboqValidationLinesEO.TASK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalFinalAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sum(nvl(SELLING_rate_NUM,0)*nvl(final_quantity_num,0)),0) from XXBOQ_VALIDATION_LINES_T where VALIDATION_HEADER_ID=XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID and BOQ_LEVEL is null and bill_page_ITEM is not null and (line_type = 'M' or estimated='N'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransEquipmentCostBudgetAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(nvl(cc.cost_code_quantity,0)*nvl(cc.cost_code_rate,0)) from xxboq_validation_cost_code_t cc,pjf_rbs_elements rbs where cc.rbs_element_id = rbs.rbs_element_id and rbs.RESOURCE_CLASS_CODE = 'EQUIPMENT' and cc.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID = XxboqValidationLinesEO.VALIDATION_HEADER_ID)
